item.title: Hypnosis Knight-Princess
item.description:
Title: Hypnosis Knight-Princess
Genre: Adventure , RPG
Developer: happypink
Publisher: Kagura Games
Franchise: Kagura Games
Release Date: Aug 22, 2025




About This Game

Gina is about to become queen of Triss... but not if her brother Morgan can help it! Morgan recruits the help of a demon, Lala, in order to hypnotize Gina so she abdicates the throne. But the demon curse has little effect on Gina, and Morgan is unable to make her relinquish the crown.

Thus, they come up with a new idea to exploit another characteristic of the demon curse: if the curse is lifted from someone else, it will be passed to the one who lifted it and accumulate. With their new dastardly ploy in mind, they spread the curse across the kingdom, forcing Gina's hand to save her citizens and in turn take on the curse herself, falling prey to its hypnotizing power.

As Gina, your mission is to travel across the kingdom of Triss and break the hypnosis curse affecting her people. To do this, you'll need to craft magic fragments and dispelling stones, which will help you perform exorcisms on the citizens. Each exorcism consumes time, so plan accordingly! You'll also face automatic battles with enemies that will take up both time and HP. The more citizens you free, the more regions of the world map you'll unlock, potentially revealing new dungeons and powerful bosses to defeat.

Live 2D Art

The character art for Gina, Lala, and others are often in motion, offering a visually dynamic experience by bringing characters to life with fluid, interactive animations. The enhanced immersion will make it feel as if you're engaging with the characters face to face. It's definitely a visual treat that elevates the overall gaming experience, building on stronger connections with the cast!

Dynamic Day and Night Cycle

A dynamic day/night cycle adds depth and realism to the game world, creating a sense of time passing that makes the environment feel alive. Certain events, quests, and characters are only available at night, which will encourage you to explore at different times, adding layers of strategy and excitement. The mood and visuals will also change with the time of day, making every in-game moment feel unique.

Strategic Time Management

The game's time management mechanic challenges players to think strategically, as each decision and action takes up valuable time that can run out quickly. With limited hours in a day, you must prioritize objectives and make choices to maximize your progress. Every moment counts and you never know what scene you'll end up unlocking next by using your time wisely!

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows¬Æ 8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
    • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

item.title: Waterpark Simulator
item.description:
Title: Waterpark Simulator
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: CayPlay
Publisher: CayPlay
Release Date: Aug 22, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Aug 22, 2025




About This Game

Waterpark Simulator is a first-person management simulator. Design, build, and manage your own waterpark. From crazy slides to tasty snacks, every detail is yours to control.

Create custom waterslides, unique pools, themed attractions, and everything else a fun, functional waterpark needs.

Spray your guests with water guns, launch beach balls at their heads, or maybe give a nervous diver a ‚Äúgentle‚Äù push off the board. It‚Äôs your park you make the rules!

In the beginning, it‚Äôs all on you. From selling tickets, serving food, saving drowning guests, fixing broken slides, cleaning up after visitors, to scooping poop out of the pool. It‚Äôs chaotic, hands-on, and all part of running a successful waterpark.

Paint walls and slides, spray custom designs onto any surface, and swap out flooring to set the tone of each area. Add props, signs, and decorations to give your park a personal touch and make every corner feel uniquely yours.

Launch guests into the air, send them flying into pools, or watch them flop helplessly after slipping on a puddle. Ragdoll physics turn every moment into a potential comedy highlight.

Keep your guests happy by setting up food stands and vending machines around your park. Prepare hot dogs, lemonade, ice cream and more!. The better the treats, the happier the visitors.

Everything you do affects your park‚Äôs overall rating from how clean it is, to how fun your slides are, to the quality of your food and amenities. The happier your guests are, the better your rating. Keep them satisfied and they‚Äôll stay longer, spend more, and want to come back.

As your park gets more popular, it‚Äôs time to expand. Unlock new areas to grow your waterpark‚Äôs size and hire staff to handle the daily chaos. With a team in place, you can focus on what really matters: building the best waterpark possible.

No AI was used in the making of this game. We pay artists for all our assets and marketing images/ videos, translation teams, devs, etc. We are proud to be a 100% human-made game.

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space

item.title: Ways of Alchemy
item.description:
Title: Ways of Alchemy
Genre: Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: RocketBrush Games
Publisher: RocketBrush Games
Release Date: Aug 22, 2025




About This Game

Ways of Alchemy is a medieval card game and alchemist simulator . Turn a handful of weeds into deadly poison, build an alchemical empire, and outwit the Inquisition. The path from humble novice to powerful master alchemist is filled with dangers and opportunities.

You start with nothing but a humble shack and basic knowledge of alchemy. But every potion can change everything ‚Äî bring wealth or draw the wrath of authorities. In a world where alchemy balances between science and Inquisition persecution, every choice determines your fate.

FEATURES

üß™ Brew over 35 different potions

üåø Discover and utilize more than 100 unique ingredients

üîÆ Master the 5 pillars of reality ‚Äî Void, Mirror, Veil, Pain and Song

üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Choose from 15 different subclasses

üó∫Ô∏è Send adventurers to 5 different regions with 24 quests

üíé Find over 70 unique rewards and artifacts

üîö Experience 13 different endings based on your choices

‚öîÔ∏è Face the consequences of your ambition with the Inquisition

CRAFT POTIONS YOUR WAY

Experiment freely or follow traditions with a flexible potion-crafting system . Follow proven recipes from your grimoire for reliable results, or take risks with creative experimentation for potentially more powerful effects. With over 100 ingredients connected to the 5 pillars of reality, your cauldron holds the potential for dozens of unique and powerful potions.

GROW YOUR ESTATE & INFLUENCE

Work your way from an inherited shack to a thriving alchemical settlement as your reputation grows among potion buyers. Manage your estate, hire hands and balance your growing influence against the watchful eyes of local authorities. Navigate the threats of Tax Inspector and the dreaded Inquisition as your power increases.

EXPLORE REGIONS FOR TREASURES

Send adventurers on perilous quests across 5 distinct regions . Equip them with your potions and artifacts before dispatching them on 24 dangerous adventures. Discover over 70 unique treasures including powerful artifacts, ancient recipes and long-lost books to fuel your ascension.

CHOOSE MULTIPLE PATHS TO ASCENSION

Unlock 15 unique subclasses that shape your alchemical journey . Stay true to pure alchemy or venture into forbidden arts like necromancy and flesh-smiting. Every decision leads toward one of 13 possible endings as you work to complete the Great Making ‚Äì the ultimate goal of any true alchemist.

System Requirements

    Minimum:

    • Processor: 2GHz or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
    • Graphics: 4GB VRAM, integrated graphics cards will only work if post-2012
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 6 GB available space

item.title: Discounty
item.description:
Title: Discounty
Genre: Casual , RPG , Simulation
Developer: Crinkle Cut Games
Publisher: PQube
Franchise: PQube
Release Date: Aug 21, 2025




About This Game

Manage your own discount supermarket! Get caught up in small-town drama, organise and plan your shop's layout, and strike lucrative trade deals as you expand your secretive aunt's business empire. Selling more frozen fries will surely heal this broken community...right?

Step into the quirky harbour town of Blomkest, where your aunt has entrusted you with managing its only supermarket. Design and organise your shop, manage stock levels, work the checkout, and strike trade deals. Build relationships with the charming locals, and grow your business empire while navigating community dynamics. Use every tool at your disposal to expand your business, but be mindful: rapid growth might ruffle a few feathers in this tight-knit community. Will you pursue endless profits, or find a way to benefit everyone in Blomkest?

Your aunt has invited you to manage the local store, 'Discounty', in the run-down harbour town of Blomkest. But beware, not everyone wants you to succeed.

Explore Blomkest after business hours and get to know the townsfolk. Turn them into loyal patrons of Discounty and uncover the town's hidden secrets.

Create an eye-catching, efficient store by rearranging shelves and products. Design inviting aisles for easy navigation and add decorations to encourage purchases!

Blomkestians don't take well to newcomers. Gain manufacturers' trust, make trade deals, and sell local specialty goods to boost Discounty profits!

Keep shelves stocked, floors clean, and the storage room organised. Ring up customers shopping promptly to keep them happy! No one likes waiting around...

As profits soar, reinvest and grow! Expand your shop to stock more goods and advertise it around town!

Choose your appearance, handpick your outfit, and pick a name that reflects your unique style. Your ever-wise Aunt will always recognise you, no matter your chosen guise.

    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5570, 1 GB
    • Storage: 570 MB available space

    • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770T or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
    • Storage: 570 MB available space

item.title: Deep Sleep: Labyrinth of the Forsaken
item.description:
Title: Deep Sleep: Labyrinth of the Forsaken
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: scriptwelder
Publisher: Armor Games Studios
Franchise: scriptwelder
Release Date: Aug 21, 2025




About This Game

Amy‚Äôs brother is dead. She hadn't even seen him in years.

Thomas has always been a little eccentric. Obsessed with lucid dreaming and the concept of other worlds. All a little too fantastical for a small town vet like Amy herself.

But then Amy comes across his journals. And what at first seems like the ramblings of a troubled mind slowly begin to seem more and more plausible. Maybe her brother was right about everything. And maybe, just maybe‚Ä¶ he isn‚Äôt actually dead.

Deep Sleep: Labyrinth of the Forsaken is a point-and-click horror adventure from veteran developer scriptwelder, and a standalone entry into the cult classic Deep Sleep series. Guide Amy deeper into the world of dreams, using the power of her mind to shape her surroundings and overcome challenges and puzzles. Explore landscapes both beautiful and terrifying in your search to uncover the truth about her brother.

But there‚Äôs a darkness lurking within the mazes of these other worlds. It knows Amy is there. And it‚Äôs very, very interested in finding her.

The game features the exploration, atmosphere, narrative, and puzzles you've come to expect and love while also adding in a sneakily complex turn-based combat system, many items to be looted and used in various ways, and a skill tree to help you overcome these nightmarish challenges.

Features:

  • Solve puzzles and defeat foes using the ability to shape Amy‚Äôs dreams around her

  • Explore nightmarish and otherworldly environments with elements of randomized design

  • Improve and unlock new skills for Amy to help keep her alive and make her stronger

  • Encounter bizarre and dangerous beings who could be friend, foe‚Ä¶ or both

  • Multiple endings and secrets to find, if you survive the beings hunting you

  • A brand new soundtrack from composer Christopher Carlone

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains pixelated violence without explicit or frequent gore. There are moments intended to frighten or provide jumpscares, as well as more serious topics like death.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 x64
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (2 * 3600)
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB)
    • Storage: 3 GB available space
